section.title: introduction
section.para: All requirements must state the use cases they are derived from.

section.title: salt execution module
section.para: We need a "salt execution module" to encapsulate operations on nodes, and apply operations

section.title: salt execution module scope
section.para: The "salt execution module" should perform all operations needed to install and manage all change on a node.

section.title: salt state module
section.para: We need a "salt state module" to calculate the operations that should be applied to a node and apply these and only these

section.title: Data source
section.para: We need a "salt data source" to drive the configuration.
This will be a pillar or a mine.

section.title: The components will have documented and defined API's/ formats.
